title: Kicked from client because of another login?
body: Basically, I was kicked from my client since it said that someone else had logged in from a different location. I immediately logged back on and then changed my password, but I'm not sure if that is all I should do. Is there anything else I should do in order to protect my account?

replies.body: Wolfess had a solid suggestion, and I'd like to add our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide which provides some good safety practices.  This info is great for accounts in and out of league!  Hope that helps!
Alright thanks! I just wanted to make sure I could keep my account as secure as possible.
I'd recommend running a scan on your computer to make sure you're not infected with spyware or keyloggers that are sending info elsewhere
